Section.Title: Description
Section.Paragraph: The GetCurrentTimesliceProgress method should directly call and return the value returned by the GetCurrentTimesliceProgress method on the IDeviceContext object for this device. This method is only provided here for convenience and efficiency, due to the large number of times and places this value is retrieved for devices.
Note that the Device base class implements this method. If a device derives from this base class, it doesn't need to implement this method itself.

SubSection.Title: Return value
SubSection.ReturnValue: The current progress of the device through the current timeslice, in nanoseconds.
